name: Island Alpine Select
description: With about 400 detailed routes, this guidebook outlines hiking, scrambling and technical rock and ice climbs on 70 of the challenging mountains of Vancouver Island.  With a focus on technical peaks and climbing routes, it's a great resource for Island alpinists planning their next adventure. Includes high resolution photos, topographical maps, detailed access and route descriptions, with select images from some of the Island’s classic climbs.
